Raymond Chen on Profile Folders

Jul 28, 2006 Aaron Parker

The latest TechNet Magazine has an article by Raymon Chen on the “Program Files” and “Documents and Settings” folders, including changes to the profiles folder in Windows Vista. It gives some clarification to the changes in Vista and I thought that it applies to my previous post.

“Another security change in Windows Vista is that the All Users profile has been moved out of the profiles directory and into the root of the drive (though a symbolic link has been left in the profiles directory for compatibility purposes).”
